channel.title: Policy & Security Think Tank Updates
channel.description: Custom RSS feed from CSIS, CFR, and other policy institutions

item.title: What the Bella-1 Teaches Us About Targeting Shadow Fleets
item.description: After a globe-spanning chase, the United States seized a sanctioned oil tanker tied to Iran and Venezuela. What does the Bella-1 reveal about shadow fleets, AIS manipulation, and how maritime interdiction is reshaping sanctions enforcement?

item.title: Greenland, Rare Earths, and Arctic Security
item.description: Greenland holds globally significant rare earth resources, but harsh conditions and weak infrastructure have stalled mining. U.S. interests are best advanced not through coercion, but coordinated investment with European allies to counter Chinaâ€™s influence.
